parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of maximum number of records to obtain at a time. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Marks the current position where reading starts. If you set this value to null, you can start from the beginning.

parameters.name: NodeGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of node groups. Valid values of the number of array elements N: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: NodeGroupNames
parameters.description: The list of node group names. Valid values of the number of array elements N: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: NodeGroupStates
parameters.description: The status of the node group. Valid values of the number of array elements N: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: NodeGroupTypes
parameters.description: The list of node group types. Valid values of the number of array elements N: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you want to create the instance.
